files.patch:
@@ -29,1 +29,0 @@
-  NUM_CORES=0
@@ -41,4 +40,1 @@
-    NUM_LCPU=`lparstat -m 2> /dev/null | $GREP -o "lcpu=[[0-9]]*" | $CUT -d "=" -f 2`
-    if test -n "$NUM_LCPU"; then
-      NUM_CORES=$NUM_LCPU
-    fi
+    NUM_CORES=`lparstat -m 2> /dev/null | $GREP -o "lcpu=[[0-9]]*" | $CUT -d "=" -f 2`
